channel.title: Exile Pk - Instant PKING!
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/703/2com.png/][IMG]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/2432/2com.png[/img][/URL] At Exile Pk we strive for performance; not only server, but everything within the server. As soon as you login to Exile Pk, you'll be able to spawn items and/or use the quest tab for packages. It will take you less then 5 minutes to begin pking!
Webclient: http://exilepk.x10host.com/web.html Downloadable: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/f2hlr192wyy06sh/client.jar Forums: coming soon!
[size=12pt]Some features:[/size] [ul][li]Stable server, without lagg and a 99.9% uptime.[/li] [li]Fully NPC summoning - familiar(s), specials, following, BoB etcetera.[/li] [li]Perfected client sided switching.[/li] [li]Spawning has been enabled for quick pking access.[/li] [li]Superb combat, absolutely fantastic.[/li] [li]Randomized PvP loots - when you kill a player.[/li] [li]Activity point system - the longer your online the more points you get, spend these on items.[/li] [li]You have the flexibility to choose your character style: master, pure and/or training rates.[/li][/ul]
And lots more features, just login and give us a chance!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/15/58p4.png/][IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/6526/58p4.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/543/yei.png/][IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/7812/yei.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/855/aj5.png/][IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/1774/aj5.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Exile Pk - Instant PKING!
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:


At Exile Pk we strive for performance; not only server, but everything within the server. As soon as you login to Exile Pk, you’ll be able to spawn items and/or use the quest tab for packages. It will take you less then 5 minutes to begin pking!

Webclient: http://exilepk.x10host.com/web.html
Downloadable: https://dl.dropbox.com/s/f2hlr192wyy06sh/client.jar
Forums: coming soon!

[size=12pt]Some features:[/size]
[ul][li]Stable server, without lagg and a 99.9% uptime.[/li]
[li]Fully NPC summoning - familiar(s), specials, following, BoB etcetera.[/li]
[li]Perfected client sided switching.[/li]
[li]Spawning has been enabled for quick pking access.[/li]
[li]Superb combat, absolutely fantastic.[/li]
[li]Randomized PvP loots - when you kill a player.[/li]
[li]Activity point system - the longer your online the more points you get, spend these on items.[/li]
[li]You have the flexibility to choose your character style: master, pure and/or training rates.[/li][/ul]

And lots more features, just login and give us a chance!



Read full topic
